message:
amra basher kellar sathey aci, 3lakh bondhu 1sathe thakle sotter joy onibarjo.
Rukhte parbena amader kew, durbar gotite agiye jabo.
Donnobad ! Sottanneshy BASHER KELLA

-তৌকির

May Allah bless all of us who are in right path............
Mostafiz Rahman

aar aktu bujina atooo like kotha theke ashe ato manusher priyo bk dekhei valo lagse
Siyam E Nur

Masud Sorker Santoঃ
Best of lacuk basherkella.

Rat Jaga Prohoryঃ
Aj ek shoptah dhore ami protibar jokhon fb te ashi tokhon-e check kori basherkellar fun 300000 otikrom korlo kina.aj amar shei asha purno hote jachchhe,
shukriya mohan allah paker kase,

ARif VAiঃ
Baserkella theke bistarito election update gulo ami n amr gramer manush k poriye shuniyesi...tara radio er upor vorosha korto...ami gramer barite thakate tara tor taza update gulo peyese...tara porokkho vabe hoyto amr maddome SOTTO O NEY ER KOTHA PROKASH KORA BASERKELLA K DHONNOBAD O OVINONDON JANIYESE...BASERKELLA er 3lak purno howate ami CHANDINA,COMILLA er pokkho theke janai ovinondon o Allahr dorbare lak lak shukria...AGIYE JAW AMRA ACHI,CHILAM..THAKBOOO..

-batagashi,chandina,comilla
